03F85CBE.SnakeInfo: The snake has no trust in humans, therefore all Boons are hidden. You must {c:FFbf6b31}give 100 offerings at once{/c} to unlock its boons.

232CADBB.AssignSkillsDescription: Give Druidic Spirit Offerings to the animal spirits in {c:FFbf6b31}Túr Dúlra{/c} to unlock their Boons. Select an unlocked Boon to activate its effect.

2D94D23C.BondingInfo_Short: Unlock every Boon from every spirit to gain access to Spirit Bonding.

47804DC1.BondingInfo_Unlocked: Now you can bond with any spirit, which will allow you to unlock a second Boon.

6D17F3BC.AllPassivesUnlocked: You've unlocked every Boon for this spirit.

78DE3F68.OfferingsText: Select an amount to offer to the spirit

8265EC15.PanelText:
Increase your reputation with this spirit by giving it offerings.
The spirit will reward you with Boons.

A3951EDA.OfferingsTextSnake: You can only offer the maximum amount

B5DA5C28.BondingInfo_Active: You can now activate an additional {s1} Boon from your Spirit Boons panel.

BFFFB80D.BondingInfo: Unlock every Boon from every spirit to gain access to Spirit Bonding. This will let you activate an additional Boon with a spirit of your choice.

EF78FE62.SnakeOffering: You must {c:FFbf6b31}give a 100 offerings at once{/c} to unlock all Boons.
